description: A summarize Fibonacci sequence: summarize the previous two terms!.
comments: From the 26th term the sequence gets into a cycle of 46.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..254 = 5 periods.
Index to sequences related to say what you see
prog: (Haskell)import Data.List (sort, group); import Data.Function (on)a036106 n = a036106_list !! na036106_list = 1 : 2 : map (read . concatMap say . reverse . group . sort)               (zipWith ((++) `on` show) a036106_list $ tail a036106_list)               where say ws = (show $ length ws) ++ [head ws]-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Oct 05 2015
author: _Floor van Lamoen_
